issue.title: *** New SubT Simulation docker image available on DockerHub ***

content.raw:
The same here - Option 1 error, Option 2 opens the main window.

When I do 

`$ export XAUTH=/tmp/.docker.xauth`

before running Option 1, then even Option 1 runs \(XAUTH is empty by default in my environment - ubuntu 18.04\)

```
$ docker inspect --format='{{index .RepoDigests 0}}' nkoenig/subt-virtual-testbed
nkoenig/subt-virtual-testbed@sha256:1145790d83973b37bd4851e6e329d24de062a99e19f898e22438c9d3882c00a6
```

…for the sha256 of the image I am running. Using

```
$ docker pull nkoenig/subt-virtual-testbed@sha256:1145790d83973b37bd4851e6e329d24de062a99e19f898e22438c9d3882c00a6
```

will give you the same image. It would be great to get some release hygiene done like using some release name/version/hash or any other unique identifier instead of tag “latest”, thanks.
content.html:
The same here - Option 1 error, Option 2 opens the main window.

When I do

$ export XAUTH=/tmp/.docker.xauth

before running Option 1, then even Option 1 runs (XAUTH is empty by default in my environment - ubuntu 18.04)

$ docker inspect --format='{{index .RepoDigests 0}}' nkoenig/subt-virtual-testbed
nkoenig/subt-virtual-testbed@sha256:1145790d83973b37bd4851e6e329d24de062a99e19f898e22438c9d3882c00a6

…for the sha256 of the image I am running. Using

$ docker pull nkoenig/subt-virtual-testbed@sha256:1145790d83973b37bd4851e6e329d24de062a99e19f898e22438c9d3882c00a6

will give you the same image. It would be great to get some release hygiene done like using some release name/version/hash or any other unique identifier instead of tag “latest”, thanks.
